title: Verify 'Services' Menu Item in Global Navigation
preconditions: A visitor is on any page of the Object Edge website where the global top navigation is present.

custom_steps_separated.content: Locate the global top navigation bar.
custom_steps_separated.expected: The global top navigation bar is visible at the top of the page.

custom_steps_separated.content: Identify a menu item labeled "Services" within the global top navigation.
custom_steps_separated.expected: A menu item precisely labeled "Services" is present in the global top navigation.

custom_steps_separated.content: Interact with the "Services" menu item (e.g., hover over or click).
custom_steps_separated.expected: The "Services" menu item is interactive and displays a dropdown menu.

title: Verify 'Digital Transformation' in 'Services' Dropdown
preconditions: A visitor is on any page of the Object Edge website. The "Services" dropdown menu is open.

custom_steps_separated.content: Visually confirm the "Services" dropdown menu is expanded and visible.
custom_steps_separated.expected: The dropdown menu associated with "Services" is clearly displayed.

custom_steps_separated.content: Within the open "Services" dropdown, locate an item labeled "Digital Transformation".
custom_steps_separated.expected: A menu item explicitly labeled "Digital Transformation" is present and visible within the "Services" dropdown.

custom_steps_separated.content: Observe the "Digital Transformation" menu item.
custom_steps_separated.expected: The "Digital Transformation" menu item is clickable and its text is clearly legible.

title: Verify Navigation to Digital Transformation Page from Dropdown
preconditions: A visitor is on any page of the Object Edge website. The "Services" dropdown is open, and "Digital Transformation" is visible and clickable.
references: QAT-114, AC2, FR2, FR5, FR11, AC15, FR29

custom_steps_separated.content: Click on the "Digital Transformation" link within the "Services" dropdown.
custom_steps_separated.expected: The browser initiates navigation away from the current page.

custom_steps_separated.content: Observe the page that loads.
custom_steps_separated.expected: The "Digital Transformation" service page loads completely and successfully.

custom_steps_separated.content: Verify the page URL displayed in the browser's address bar.
custom_steps_separated.expected: The URL is `/services/digital-transformation-consulting`.

title: Verify Digital Transformation Page Loads Without Errors
preconditions: A visitor has navigated to the "Digital Transformation" service page (e.g., via the Services dropdown or direct URL).

custom_steps_separated.content: Observe the page content and layout upon loading.
custom_steps_separated.expected: All page elements (text, images, interactive components) are rendered correctly. No broken elements, missing images, layout shifts, or placeholder content are visible.

custom_steps_separated.content: Open the browser's developer console (e.g., F12).
custom_steps_separated.expected: No critical errors (e.g., JavaScript errors, 404 resource not found errors, console warnings indicating broken functionality) are displayed in the console upon page load.

title: Verify Page H1 Title is 'Digital Transformation Consulting'
preconditions: A visitor is on the "Digital Transformation" service page.

custom_steps_separated.content: Locate the primary heading (H1) element on the page.
custom_steps_separated.expected: A single H1 element is present and prominently displayed as the main title of the page's content.

custom_steps_separated.content: Read the text content of the H1 heading.
custom_steps_separated.expected: The H1 heading text is exactly "Digital Transformation Consulting".

custom_steps_separated.content: (If applicable) Verify the H1 title consistency with other service titles on the site.
custom_steps_separated.expected: The H1 title "Digital Transformation Consulting" is consistent with how the service is named and presented in other areas of the site (e.g., within internal links or service listings).

title: Verify Presence of Introductory Summary Below H1
preconditions: A visitor is on the "Digital Transformation" service page. The H1 title is visible.

custom_steps_separated.content: Scroll down directly below the H1 heading.
custom_steps_separated.expected: An introductory summary text block is present immediately below the H1 title.

custom_steps_separated.content: Review the content of the introductory summary.
custom_steps_separated.expected: The summary describes Object Edge’s digital transformation practice (e.g., a data-driven consultancy that helps enterprises evolve their digital strategies and experience design).

title: Verify Presence of Hero Image/Banner
preconditions: A visitor is on the "Digital Transformation" service page.

custom_steps_separated.content: Visually inspect the upper section of the page, typically near the H1 or introductory summary.
custom_steps_separated.expected: A prominent hero image or banner related to digital consulting is displayed. The image is loaded correctly and is visually appealing.

title: Verify Presence of Key Transformation Pillars Section
preconditions: A visitor is on the "Digital Transformation" service page.

custom_steps_separated.content: Scroll down the page and look for a distinct section outlining specific service offerings or competencies related to digital transformation.
custom_steps_separated.expected: A clearly defined section is present that lists key transformation pillars.

title: Verify All Specified Transformation Pillars Are Listed
preconditions: A visitor is on the "Digital Transformation" service page. The section for key transformation pillars is visible.

custom_steps_separated.content: Examine the list of items within the key transformation pillars section.
custom_steps_separated.expected: All of the following pillars are present and clearly listed: Strategic planning, Platform evaluations, Program leadership, Digital road mapping, Generative AI consulting, Change management, and Customized training.

title: Verify Each Transformation Pillar Has a Business Value Description
preconditions: A visitor is on the "Digital Transformation" service page. The section for key transformation pillars is visible, and all pillars are listed.

custom_steps_separated.content: For each listed transformation pillar (e.g., Strategic planning, Platform evaluations, etc.), check for an accompanying text description.
custom_steps_separated.expected: Each transformation pillar has a short description associated with it.

custom_steps_separated.content: Read the content of each description.
custom_steps_separated.expected: Each description explains the business value of that specific transformation pillar.

title: Verify Presence of 'What Is Digital Transformation?' Explainer Block
preconditions: A visitor is on the "Digital Transformation" service page.

custom_steps_separated.content: Scroll through the page content and look for a dedicated content block with a specific title.
custom_steps_separated.expected: A dedicated explainer block titled "What Is Digital Transformation?" is present on the page.

title: Verify Explainer Block Content Reflects Modernization Concept Concisely
preconditions: A visitor is on the "Digital Transformation" service page. The "What Is Digital Transformation?" explainer block is visible.

custom_steps_separated.content: Read the content within the "What Is Digital Transformation?" explainer block.
custom_steps_separated.expected: The content is concise and clearly reflects the concept of modernization of digital business tools and experiences.

title: Verify Presence of 'Digital Maturity Assessment' Section
preconditions: A visitor is on the "Digital Transformation" service page.

custom_steps_separated.content: Scroll through the page content and look for a section specifically discussing digital maturity assessments.
custom_steps_separated.expected: A distinct section titled or clearly about "Digital Maturity Assessment" is present on the page.

title: Verify Presence of Clearly Visible Main Call-to-Action Button(s)
preconditions: A visitor is on the "Digital Transformation" service page.

custom_steps_separated.content: Scan the page for prominent call-to-action (CTA) buttons that encourage engagement (e.g., consultation, request for info).
custom_steps_separated.expected: At least one clearly visible, prominent, and interactive CTA button is present on the page, encouraging a general lead generation action.

title: Verify Main CTA Button Labels Match Examples
preconditions: A visitor is on the "Digital Transformation" service page. Main CTA button(s) are visible.

custom_steps_separated.content: Identify the text labels of the prominent main CTA button(s).
custom_steps_separated.expected: The CTA button labels are either "Schedule a Free Consultation" and/or "Request Digital Maturity Assessment", or consistent variations that clearly convey a similar action.

title: Verify Main CTAs Link to Valid Lead Capture Destination
preconditions: A visitor is on the "Digital Transformation" service page. Main CTA button(s) are visible.

custom_steps_separated.content: Click on each prominent main CTA button.
custom_steps_separated.expected: Clicking the CTA button(s) navigates the user to a functional contact form, a lead capture module, or a calendar booking service. The destination loads without errors.

title: Verify Presence of Embedded CTA within 'Digital Maturity Assessment' Section
preconditions: A visitor is on the "Digital Transformation" service page. The "Digital Maturity Assessment" section is visible.

custom_steps_separated.content: Within the "Digital Maturity Assessment" section, look for a call-to-action button.
custom_steps_separated.expected: An embedded CTA button is present, specifically inviting users to schedule a complimentary assessment.

title: Verify Embedded Assessment CTA Links to Valid Destination
preconditions: A visitor is on the "Digital Transformation" service page. The embedded CTA within the "Digital Maturity Assessment" section is visible.

custom_steps_separated.content: Click on the "Schedule a complimentary assessment" CTA button within the "Digital Maturity Assessment" section.
custom_steps_separated.expected: Clicking the button navigates the user to a functional contact form, a lead capture module, or a calendar booking service dedicated to scheduling assessments. The destination loads without errors.

title: Verify Overall Consistent Styling with Main Site
preconditions: A visitor is on the "Digital Transformation" service page. Access to the main Object Edge website for comparison is available.

custom_steps_separated.content: Visually compare the fonts used on the "Digital Transformation" page with the fonts used on other pages of the main website.
custom_steps_separated.expected: Fonts (typefaces, sizes, weights) are consistent with the main site's established typography.

custom_steps_separated.content: Visually compare the color palette (e.g., text colors, background colors, button colors) on the "Digital Transformation" page with the main website.
custom_steps_separated.expected: Colors are consistent with the main site's branding and color scheme.

custom_steps_separated.content: Visually assess the spacing (e.g., line height, paragraph spacing, component margins/padding) and general layout on the "Digital Transformation" page against the main website.
custom_steps_separated.expected: Spacing and overall layout adhere to the consistent design system of the main site.

title: Verify UX Facilitates Easy Scanning and Comprehension
preconditions: A visitor is on the "Digital Transformation" service page.

custom_steps_separated.content: Scroll through the entire page content. Observe the layout, use of headings, bullet points, and visual breaks.
custom_steps_separated.expected: The page content is organized logically with clear headings and subheadings. Text blocks are broken up to prevent information overload, and whitespace is used effectively.

custom_steps_separated.content: Read various sections of the page.
custom_steps_separated.expected: Information can be easily scanned and key points are quickly identifiable. The flow of information is intuitive, aiding comprehension.

title: Verify Page URL is Correct
preconditions: A visitor has navigated to the "Digital Transformation" service page.

custom_steps_separated.content: Check the URL displayed in the browser's address bar.
custom_steps_separated.expected: The canonical URL for the page is exactly `/services/digital-transformation-consulting`.

title: Verify Presence of Meta Title Tag
preconditions: A visitor is on the "Digital Transformation" service page. Browser developer tools are accessible.

custom_steps_separated.content: Open the browser's developer tools (e.g., F12) and inspect the `<head>` section of the page's HTML.
custom_steps_separated.expected: A `<title>` tag is present within the `<head>` section of the HTML.

custom_steps_separated.content: Examine the content of the `<title>` tag.
custom_steps_separated.expected: The `<title>` tag contains relevant text optimized for _digital transformation consulting_ keywords.

title: Verify Presence of Meta Description Tag
preconditions: A visitor is on the "Digital Transformation" service page. Browser developer tools are accessible.

custom_steps_separated.content: Open the browser's developer tools and inspect the `<head>` section of the page's HTML.
custom_steps_separated.expected: A `<meta name="description">` tag is present within the `<head>` section.

custom_steps_separated.content: Examine the content of the `content` attribute within the `meta name="description"` tag.
custom_steps_separated.expected: The meta description content is relevant and optimized for _digital transformation consulting_ keywords.

title: Verify Presence of Open Graph (OG) Tags
preconditions: A visitor is on the "Digital Transformation" service page. Browser developer tools are accessible.

custom_steps_separated.content: Open the browser's developer tools and inspect the `<head>` section of the page's HTML.
custom_steps_separated.expected: Essential Open Graph tags (e.g., `og:title`, `og:description`, `og:image`, `og:url`) are present within the `<head>` section.

custom_steps_separated.content: Examine the content of the `content` attributes for the detected OG tags.
custom_steps_separated.expected: The OG tags contain relevant content optimized for _digital transformation consulting_ keywords and correctly reference the page and relevant imagery.

title: Verify Analytics Tagging for CTA Clicks
preconditions: A visitor is on the "Digital Transformation" service page. Browser developer tools are open with network/console monitoring for analytics events (e.g., Google Analytics debugger, network tab).

custom_steps_separated.content: Identify all interactive CTA buttons on the page (e.g., main CTAs, embedded assessment CTA).
custom_steps_separated.expected: All clickable CTA buttons are clearly identifiable.

custom_steps_separated.content: Click on each identified CTA button one by one.
custom_steps_separated.expected: For each click, a corresponding analytics event (e.g., a Google Analytics event) is fired and visible in the network tab or analytics debugger, capturing the click action and relevant details (e.g., CTA label, page URL).

title: Verify Content Reflects Object Edge's Offerings and Value Proposition
preconditions: A visitor is on the "Digital Transformation" service page.

custom_steps_separated.content: Review the entire page content, including headings, introductory summary, transformation pillar descriptions, and explainer blocks.
custom_steps_separated.expected: The content is detailed, engaging, and accurately describes Object Edge’s digital transformation consulting services. It clearly communicates the value proposition for enterprise B2B and B2C clients.

custom_steps_separated.content: Confirm that the content specifically covers current offerings such as strategic planning, program leadership, digital road mapping, generative AI consulting, change management, and customized training.
custom_steps_separated.expected: The page content explicitly mentions and elaborates on these current offerings.

title: Verify Content, Visuals, and CTAs Support Lead Generation Goals
preconditions: A visitor is on the "Digital Transformation" service page.

custom_steps_separated.content: Review the overall content, visuals (e.g., hero image), and placement/wording of all Call-to-Action (CTA) buttons.
custom_steps_separated.expected: The page is designed to effectively guide visitors towards lead capture actions. Content encourages inquiries, visuals support the professional offering, and CTAs are prominent and persuasive.

title: Verify Content, Visuals, and CTAs Support Customer Understanding
preconditions: A visitor is on the "Digital Transformation" service page.

custom_steps_separated.content: Review the entire page content, including introductory text, pillar descriptions, and explainer blocks.
custom_steps_separated.expected: The information presented is clear, structured, and comprehensive, enabling customers to understand Object Edge's approach to digital transformation for enterprise B2B/B2C clients.

custom_steps_separated.content: Assess the role of visuals and CTAs in enhancing comprehension.
custom_steps_separated.expected: Visuals are relevant and support the understanding of complex concepts. CTAs are placed logically to guide further information gathering or engagement.
